item.title: Codes
item.description: Related to bash: Allow files access to collaborators on the computing cluster Color a specific pattern in the output of find Define symbolic link Find a specific pattern in a bunsh of files Replace symbolic links by the target files Update symbolic links Related to Git: Remove sensitive files in Git history [Tutorial] Split a GitHub repository into a main repos and a submodule Related to R: [Tutorial] Access two versions of R within R Studio Clean R environment butâ€¦ Increase the size of the legend keys Subset the i-th elements of a nested list Related to md / html:
